title: The Hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy. Volume 2
brief_description: The Earth has been destroyed to make way for the space age equivalent of a freeway and Arthur Dent must not only cope with the loss of his planet, but the fact that his best friend Ford Prefect is from another planet, that Zaphod Beeblebrox is a pyschotic and that the Earth was once a computer designed by white mice to answer the wuestion of life, the universe and everything. The second volume of the popular televsion adaptation of the Douglas Adams series of books.
